description: Variation of Condition 1 (approved plans) of planning permission 22/AP/1085 (Demolition of existing vacant detached single family house and erection of replacement detached, two-storey, single family house, with basement and rear garden building (including cycle storage). New driveway to the front, and landscaping across the site). Amendments include:Introduction of a small store at basement level that can be accessed via lightwell lightwell.Introduction of air source heat pump to front gardenAlterations to the ground floor rear glazing designMoved the southern wall of the central circulation hall 170mm south, closer to 59 Alleyn Road to increase headroom above second floor stair wellReduced the width of the southern wing to 7190mm from 7450mm Removed the south facing, first floor window from the landingMoved the short length of first floor wall on the northern face of the Study Nook 195mm northWindow arrangement into Master Bedroom at first floor levelAdded a small dormer to the rear slope of the roof of the southern wing Increased the pitch of the roof from 45 degrees to 50 degrees.Increased the ridge height of the main roof by 300mm creating an upstand ridge to conceal PV panels on the flat roof area.Amendments to front garden design Amendments to rear garden design including design and position of the garden studio buildingAlterations to roof plan to accommodate AC condenserAlterations to some approved materials
